The [93mengineered[0m [93mMADV[0m [93msites[0m [93machieve[0m [93mnearly[0m [93m100[0m% [93mCO[0m [93m2[0m -to-[93mCH[0m [93m4[0m [93mselectivity[0m with a [93mproduction[0m [93mrate[0m of [93m251[0m.[93m85[0m [93mμmol[0m [93mg[0m -[93m1[0m [93mh[0m -[93m1[0m , [93mapproximately[0m [93m75[0m [93mtimes[0m [93mhigher[0m than [93mpristine[0m [93mTiO[0m [93m2[0m . These [93mfindings[0m [93mhighlight[0m the [93msignificance[0m of [93madjacent[0m [93msites[0m with [93mactive[0m [93melectronic[0m [93mstates[0m in [93mprotonation[0m [93mprocesses[0m and [93mprovide[0m [93mguidance[0m for [92mdesigning[0m [93mselective[0m [93mcatalytic[0m [92msystems[0m.

- [93mHigher[0m-[93morder[0m [93mtopological[0m [93mpoint[0m [93mstates[0m of [93me[0m/[93m2[0m [93mcharge[0m.: [93mTopological[0m [93mcorner[0m [93mstates[0m of [93mtwo[0m-[93mdimensional[0m ([93m2D[0m) [93mhigher[0m-[93morder[0m [93mtopological[0m [93minsulators[0m ([93mHOTIs[0m) not only [93mserve[0m as a [93munique[0m [93msignature[0m of [93mhigher[0m-[93morder[0m [93mtopology[0m, but [93malso[0m [93mpossess[0m [93mtremendous[0m [93mpotentials[0m in [93mprobing[0m, [93mconfining[0m, and [93mmanipulating[0m [93mparticles[0m or [93mquasiparticles[0m as [93mpossible[0m [93mcarriers[0m of [93minformation[0m and [93menergy[0m. [93mHowever[0m, [93mtopological[0m [93mcorner[0m [93mstates[0m are [93mnecessarily[0m [93mpinned[0m to [93mcertain[0m [93msymmetric[0m [93mpositions[0m at the [93mouter[0m [93mboundary[0m of a [93mHOTI[0m [93msample[0m, [93mimposing[0m [93mstrict[0m [93mlimitations[0m on [93mtheir[0m [93mpractical[0m [93muse[0m in [93mterms[0m of [93mnumber[0m and [93mpositioning[0m. [93mHere[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mpropose[0m a [93mtheoretical[0m [93mconcept[0m of [93mhigher[0m-[93morder[0m [93mtopological[0m [93mpoint[0m [93mstates[0m ([93mHOTPS[0m) at [93m0D[0m [93minner[0m [93mvacancies[0m in [93m2D[0m [93mHOTIs[0m that [93mcarry[0m a [93mfractional[0m [93mcharge[0m of [93me[0m/[93m2[0m, to [93movercome[0m the [93mlimitations[0m [93massociated[0m with [93mcorner[0m [93mstates[0m. [93mExploiting[0m this [93mnew[0m [93mconcept[0m for the [93mHOTI[0m [93mphase[0m in a [93mKekulé[0m [93mlattice[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mfurther[0m [93mexperimentally[0m [93mrealize[0m [93mHOTPS[0m in [93mboth[0m [93macoustic[0m and [93mphotonic[0m [93mmetamaterials[0m. By [93mvarying[0m the [93mspatial[0m [93mdistance[0m between a [93mpair[0m of [93mvacancies[0m, the in-[93mgap[0m [93mHOTPS[0m and [93mtheir[0m [93mcharacteristic[0m [93menergy[0m [93msplitting[0m are [93mexperimentally[0m [93mobserved[0m, [93mindicating[0m the [93mtopology[0m-[93mmodified[0m [93mlonger[0m-[93mrange[0m [93minter[0m-[93mHOTPS[0m [93minteraction[0m. [93mOur[0m [93mfindings[0m that [93minner[0m [93mvacancies[0m [93mcan[0m [93mexhibit[0m the [93msame[0m [93mtopological[0m [93mproperties[0m as [93mouter[0m [93mcorners[0m, [93mincluding[0m [93mbound[0m [93mtopological[0m [93mstates[0m and [93mquantized[0m [93mfractional[0m [93mcharges[0m, and [93mcan[0m be [93mcreated[0m [93mmore[0m [93mcontrollably[0m, [93mintroduce[0m a [93mnew[0m [93mavenue[0m in [93mHOTI[0m [93mresearch[0m and [93mset[0m the [93mstage[0m for [93mwider[0m [93mapplications[0m.

- [93mElectrophysiological[0m [95mdiagnosis[0m [93musing[0m the [93mcoefficient[0m of [93mvariation[0m of [93mR[0m-[93mR[0m [93mintervals[0m and a [93mpoint[0m-of-[93mcare[0m [93mnerve[0m [93mconduction[0m [93mdevice[0m is [93mhighly[0m [93mcorrelated[0m to the [95mdiagnosis[0m of [93mdiabetic[0m [93mpolyneuropathy[0m [93musing[0m [93mconventional[0m [93melectromyographs[0m.: [93mAims[0m/[93mintroduction[0m: While [93mtreatment[0m for [93mdiabetic[0m [93mpolyneuropathy[0m ([93mDPN[0m) is [93mstill[0m [93mdeveloping[0m, [93mprogress[0m [93mhas[0m [93mstagnated[0m. The [93malignment[0m between [93mpathological[0m [93mneurodegeneration[0m in [93mDPN[0m and [93mpatients[0m' [93msubjective[0m [93msymptoms[0m is [93moften[0m [93mlow[0m, [93myet[0m these [93msymptoms[0m are [93mfrequently[0m [93mused[0m for [95mdiagnosis[0m. This [93mreliance[0m [93mhas[0m [93mhindered[0m the [93mdevelopment[0m of [93meffective[0m [93mdrugs[0m to [93mprevent[0m [93mneurodegeneration[0m. This [93mstudy[0m [93maims[0m to [93mestablish[0m an [93mobjective[0m [93melectrophysiological[0m [93mdiagnostic[0m [93mmethod[0m that [93mcould[0m [93msupport[0m [93mfuture[0m [93mtreatment[0m [93mdevelopment[0m and [95mvalidate[0m its [93maccuracy[0m. [93mMaterials[0m and [93mmethods[0m: This [93mretrospective[0m [93mmulticenter[0m [93mcohort[0m [93mstudy[0m [93minvolved[0m [93mhospitalized[0m [93mdiabetic[0m [93mpatients[0m. A [93mtotal[0m of [93m314[0m [93mpatients[0m [93munderwent[0m [93mnerve[0m [93mconduction[0m [93mstudies[0m [93musing[0m [93mstandard[0m [93melectromyography[0m and a [93msimplified[0m [93mnerve[0m [93mconduction[0m [93mtesting[0m [93mdevice[0m ([93mNC[0m-[93mstat[0m/[93mDPNCheck[0m™), [93malong[0m with [93melectrocardiogram[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mcoefficient[0m of [93mvariation[0m of [93mR[0m-[93mR[0m [93mintervals[0m ([93mCV[0m [93mR[0m-[93mR[0m ). [93mPatients[0m with a [93mseverity[0m [93mclassification[0m of [93mStage[0m [93m2[0m or [93mhigher[0m [93mbased[0m on [93melectromyography[0m were [93mdefined[0m as [93mhaving[0m [93mDPN[0m. [93mLogistic[0m [93mregression[0m [93manalysis[0m was [93mused[0m to [93midentify[0m [93msignificant[0m [93mfactors[0m [93mexplaining[0m [93mDPN[0m [93mpresence[0m, [93mfollowed[0m by [93mROC[0m [93manalysis[0m to [93mdetermine[0m [93moptimal[0m [93mcutoff[0m [93mvalues[0m for [95mdiagnosis[0m. [93mResults[0m: [93mSignificant[0m [93mfactors[0m [93mincluded[0m [93mresting[0m [93mCV[0m [93mR[0m-[93mR[0m , [93msural[0m [93mnerve[0m [93mconduction[0m [93mvelocity[0m ([93mSNCV[0m), and [93mamplitude[0m of [93msensory[0m [93mnerve[0m [93maction[0m [93mpotential[0m ([93mSNAP[0m). [93mSNCV[0m [93mhad[0m the [93mhighest[0m [93marea[0m under the [93mcurve[0m ([93mAUC[0m = [93m0[0m.[93m823[0m). The [93moptimal[0m [93mcutoff[0m [93mvalues[0m were [93m1[0m.[93m62[0m% for [93mCV[0m [93mR[0m-[93mR[0m , [93m46[0m.[93m5[0m [93mm[0m/[93ms[0m for [93mSNCV[0m, and [93m10[0m.[93m5[0m [93mμV[0m for [93mSNAP[0m. [93mDiagnosing[0m [93mDPN[0m [93mbased[0m on [93mabnormalities[0m in [93mtwo[0m or [93mmore[0m of these [93mthree[0m [93mconditions[0m [93myielded[0m an [93maccuracy[0m of [93m79[0m.[93m3[0m%. [93mConclusions[0m: The [93mestablished[0m [93mdiagnostic[0m [93mcriteria[0m of [93mDPN[0m [93mdemonstrate[0m [93mhigh[0m [93mperformance[0m and are [93mexpected[0m to be [93mapplicable[0m in [93mclinical[0m [93msettings[0m.

This [93mstudy[0m [93mevaluated[0m the [93mimpact[0m of [93mmulti[0m-[93mhit[0m [93mTP53[0m ([93mdel[0m([93m17p[0m) and [93mTP53[0m [91mmutation[0m or ≥ [93m2[0m [93mTP53[0m [91mmutations[0m) [93mcompared[0m with [93mother[0m [93mHR[0m [93mabnormalities[0m on [93mprogression[0m-[93mfree[0m [93msurvival[0m ([93mPFS[0m), [93moverall[0m [93msurvival[0m ([93mOS[0m) and [93mblood[0m [93msignature[0m in a [93mreal[0m-[93mworld[0m [93mcohort[0m of [93m204[0m [93mpatients[0m with [93mMM[0m [93mtreated[0m with [93mnovel[0m [93magents[0m ([93mmedian[0m [93mfollow[0m-up [93m28[0m [93mmonths[0m). [93mPatients[0m with [93mmulti[0m-[93mhit[0m [93mTP53[0m ([93m10[0m.[93m4[0m%) [93mhad[0m the [93mshortest[0m [93mPFS[0m and [93mOS[0m [93mcompared[0m with those with [93msingle[0m [93mHR[0m [93mabnormalities[0m ([93mp[0m ≤ [93m0[0m.[93m011[0m) or with [93mco[0m-[93moccurrence[0m of ≥ [93m2[0m [93mother[0m [93mHR[0m [93mabnormalities[0m ([93mp[0m ≤ [93m0[0m.[93m002[0m), [93mregardless[0m of [93mtherapy[0m [93mline[0m. The [93mrelative[0m [93mrisk[0m of [93mearly[0m [93mprogression[0m in [93mpatients[0m with [93mmulti[0m-[93mhit[0m [93mTP53[0m was [93malmost[0m [93mthree[0m [93mtimes[0m [93mhigher[0m than that of [93mpatients[0m with [93mother[0m [93mHR[0m [93mabnormalities[0m. The [93mprevalence[0m of [93mTP53[0m [93malterations[0m [93mincreased[0m in [93mlater[0m [93mdisease[0m [93mstages[0m: [93mmulti[0m-[93mhit[0m [93mTP53[0m was [93mdetected[0m in [93m7[0m.[93m6[0m% of [93mpatients[0m with ≤ [93m1[0m [93mprior[0m [93mtherapy[0m [93mline[0m and in [93m36[0m.[93m4[0m% of [93mpatients[0m with ≥ [93m2[0m [93mprior[0m [93mlines[0m. [93mPatients[0m with [93mmulti[0m-[93mhit[0m [93mTP53[0m [93malso[0m [93mdiffered[0m in [93mblood[0m [93msignature[0m, [93mparticularly[0m in [93mcounts[0m of [93mwhite[0m [93mblood[0m [93mcells[0m, [93mlymphocytes[0m, [93mserum[0m [93mcreatinine[0m and [93mβ2[0m-[93mmicroglobulin[0m [93mlevels[0m [93mcompared[0m with those with [93mother[0m [93mHR[0m [93mabnormalities[0m. In [93mconclusion[0m, [93mmulti[0m-[93mhit[0m [93mTP53[0m is [93massociated[0m with the [93mpoorest[0m [93msurvival[0m among [93mall[0m [93mHR[0m [93msubgroups[0m in [93mMM[0m. [93mConsidering[0m that [93mTP53[0m [93malterations[0m [93maccumulate[0m during [93mMM[0m [93mprogression[0m and are [93massociated[0m with [93mdrug[0m [93mresistance[0m even in the [93mcontext[0m of [93mnovel[0m [93mtherapies[0m, [93mour[0m [93mstudy[0m [93mfurther[0m [93memphasizes[0m the [93mneed[0m for [93mroutine[0m [93mevaluation[0m of [93mboth[0m [93mdel[0m([93m17p[0m) and [93mTP53[0m [91mmutations[0m. [93mPatients[0m with [93mmulti[0m-[93mhit[0m [93mTP53[0m [93mshould[0m be [93mprioritized[0m for [93minclusion[0m in [93mtrials[0m of [93mnovel[0m [93mtherapeutic[0m [93mstrategies[0m.

- [93mTailoring[0m [93mcarbon[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mnanozymes[0m without [93mmetal[0m [93mcofactors[0m: [92mDesign[0m [93mprinciples[0m and [93mapplications[0m [93macross[0m [93mtherapeutics[0m and [93msensing[0m.: [93mMetal[0m-[93mfree[0m [93mnanozymes[0m ([93mMFNs[0m), [93mcomposed[0m of [93mheteroatom[0m-[93mdoped[0m [93mcarbon[0m [93mframeworks[0m, [93mconductive[0m [93mpolymers[0m, and [93mπ[0m-[93mconjugated[0m [93mnetworks[0m, [93mhave[0m [93memerged[0m as [93mversatile[0m [93menzyme[0m [93mmimics[0m that [93mobviate[0m the [93mtoxicity[0m and [93minstability[0m [93massociated[0m with [93mmetal[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mcounterparts[0m. Through the [93mstrategic[0m [93mincorporation[0m of [93mnitrogen[0m ([93mN[0m), [93moxygen[0m ([93mO[0m), [93msulfur[0m ([93mS[0m), [93mphosphorus[0m ([93mP[0m), [93miodine[0m ([93mI[0m), and [93mselenium[0m ([93mSe[0m) [93mdopants[0m, [93malongside[0m the [93mdeliberate[0m [93mdefect[0m [92mengineering[0m of [93msp²[0m [93mdomains[0m and [93mvacancy[0m [93msites[0m, these [93mmaterials[0m [93mreplicates[0m [93msuperoxide[0m [93mdismutase[0m, [93mglutathione[0m [93mperoxidase[0m, [93mcatalase[0m, [93moxidase[0m, and [93mperoxidase[0m [93mactivities[0m under [93mphysiological[0m and [93menvironmental[0m [93mconditions[0m. This [93mreview[0m not only [93moutlines[0m the [93mstructural[0m [92mdesign[0m [93mprinciples[0m and [93mcatalytic[0m [93mmechanisms[0m of [93mMFNs[0m but [93malso[0m [93mpresents[0m a [93mcomparative[0m [93manalysis[0m with [93mtraditional[0m [93mmetal[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mnanozymes[0m, [93mhighlighting[0m [93mdifferences[0m in [93mcatalytic[0m [91mpathways[0m, [93mstability[0m, and [93mbiocompatibility[0m. [93mRecent[0m [93mstudies[0m are [93msystematically[0m [93mcategorized[0m into [93mfour[0m [93mmajor[0m [93mapplication[0m [93mdomains[0m-[93mantioxidant[0m [93mtherapeutics[0m, [93mtumor[0m-[93mtargeted[0m [93mcatalytic[0m [93mtherapy[0m, [93mdiagnostic[0m and [93mbiosensing[0m [92mplatforms[0m, [93mantimicrobial[0m [92msystems[0m, and [93menvironmental[0m [93mremediation[0m-[93mshowcasing[0m [93mrepresentative[0m [93mexamples[0m [93msuch[0m as [93mbiomass[0m-[93mderived[0m [93mcarbon[0m [93mdots[0m, [93mpolyphenol[0m-[93mfunctionalized[0m [93mnanoparticles[0m, [93msingle[0m-[93matom[0m [93mcatalysts[0m, [93mconductive[0m [93mpolyaniline[0m [92mconstructs[0m, and [93mphotocatalytic[0m [93mcarbon[0m [93mnitride[0m. [93mRepresentative[0m [93mcase[0m [93mstudies[0m are [93mdiscussed[0m to [93melucidate[0m [93mkey[0m [93mstructure[0m-[93mfunction[0m [93mrelationships[0m and [93mexperimentally[0m [93msupported[0m [93moutcomes[0m, [93mencompassing[0m [95mvalidated[0m in [93mvitro[0m and in [93mvivo[0m [93mfindings[0m [93macross[0m [93mantioxidant[0m, [93mtherapeutic[0m, and [93mdiagnostic[0m [92msystems[0m. This [93mcomparative[0m and [93mintegrative[0m [93mperspective[0m [93mestablishes[0m a [93mcohesive[0m [92mframework[0m for the [93mrational[0m [92mdesign[0m and [93mtranslational[0m [93mdevelopment[0m of [93mnext[0m-[93mgeneration[0m [93mMFNs[0m.

- [93mTensile[0m [93mStrain[0m [93mRelease[0m by [93mSurface[0m [93mModulation[0m with [93mAmylamine[0m [93mHydrochloride[0m [93mtoward[0m [93mImproved[0m [93mEfficiency[0m and during the [93muncontrolled[0m [93mannealing[0m [93mprocess[0m is [93mhazardous[0m to the [93mefficiency[0m and [93mstability[0m of [93mperovskite[0m [93msolar[0m [93mcells[0m. [93mHerein[0m, a [93msurface[0m [93mmodulation[0m [93mstrategy[0m with a [93mlong[0m-[93mchain[0m [93mamylamine[0m [93mhydrochloride[0m ([93mAAC[0m) is [93memployed[0m to [93mwide[0m-[93mbandgap[0m [93mperovskite[0m [93mfilms[0m for [93mreleasing[0m the [93mtensile[0m [93mstress[0m. [93mBenefiting[0m from the [93meffective[0m [93mstrain[0m [93mregulation[0m and [93mstrong[0m [93mpassivation[0m [93minteraction[0m of [93mAAC[0m, not only is the [93mcompressive[0m-[93mstrain[0m [93mperovskite[0m [93mfilm[0m [93mestablished[0m with a [93mreduced[0m [93mdefect[0m [93mdensity[0m and an [93moptimized[0m [93menergy[0m [93mlevel[0m but [93malso[0m the [93mphase[0m [93msegregation[0m is [93msignificantly[0m [93msuppressed[0m. [93mMeanwhile[0m, the [93mAAC[0m-[93mmodified[0m [93mperovskite[0m [93mfilm[0m [93machieves[0m [93mp[0m-to-[93mn[0m-[93mtype[0m [93mtransformation[0m and [93mregulates[0m the [93menergy[0m [93mlevel[0m [93marrangement[0m of the [93mPSCs[0m. [93mConsequently[0m, the [93moptimized[0m [93mdevice[0m after [93mAAC[0m [93mtreatment[0m [93machieves[0m a [93msuperior[0m [93mpower[0m [93mconversion[0m [93mefficiency[0m of [93m21[0m.[93m61[0m%. [93mMoreover[0m, the [93munencapsulated[0m [93mdevice[0m [93mexhibits[0m an [93mimproved[0m [93mlong[0m-[93mterm[0m [93mstability[0m, [93mmaintaining[0m [93m85[0m.[93m05[0m% of its [93minitial[0m [93mefficiency[0m for [93mmore[0m than [93m500[0m [93mh[0m at a [93mrelative[0m [93mhumidity[0m of [93m55[0m% and a [93mtemperature[0m of [93m25[0m °[93mC[0m.
- [93mZnO[0m@[93mPVDF[0m/[93mCS[0m [93mPiezoelectric[0m [93mNanofibrous[0m [93mMembrane[0m [93mPromotes[0m the [93mHealing[0m of [93mInfected[0m [93mWounds[0m [93mStimulated[0m by [93mLow[0m-[93mIntensity[0m [93mPulsed[0m [93mUltrasound[0m.: As the [93mlargest[0m [93morgan[0m [93minterfacing[0m [93mdirectly[0m with the [93mexternal[0m [93menvironment[0m, [93mskin[0m is [93mhighly[0m [93mvulnerable[0m to [93minjuries[0m from [93mtrauma[0m ([93me[0m.[93mg[0m., [93mvehicular[0m [93maccidents[0m, [93mlacerations[0m, [93mburns[0m) or [93msurgical[0m [93mresection[0m. The [93mhealing[0m of [93msuch[0m [93mdefects[0m is [93mfrequently[0m [93mprotracted[0m and [93msusceptible[0m to [93mmicrobial[0m [93minfection[0m, which [93mexacerbates[0m [93mrecovery[0m [93mtimelines[0m. [93mBioelectric[0m [93msignaling[0m [93mhas[0m [93memerged[0m as a [93mcritical[0m [93mmodulator[0m of [93mwound[0m [93mrepair[0m [93mprocesses[0m. [93mConcurrently[0m, [93mdecades[0m of [93mantibiotic[0m [93mmisuse[0m [93mhave[0m [93mprecipitated[0m [93mwidespread[0m [93mbacterial[0m [93mresistance[0m, with [93mbiofilm[0m [93mformation[0m [93mfurther[0m [93mcomplicating[0m [93mtherapeutic[0m [93mefficacy[0m. [93mConsequently[0m, [93mdeveloping[0m [93msafe[0m and [93meffective[0m [93mantimicrobial[0m [93mstrategies[0m to [93mshield[0m [93mwounds[0m [93magainst[0m [93mdrug[0m-[93mresistant[0m [93mpathogens[0m is [93mimperative[0m. [93mMetallic[0m [93mnanoparticles[0m, [93mnotably[0m [93mzinc[0m [93moxide[0m [93mnanoparticles[0m ([93mZnO[0m-[93mNPs[0m), [93mhave[0m [93mgarnered[0m [93msignificant[0m [93mattention[0m for [93mtheir[0m [93mpotent[0m [93mantibacterial[0m [93mproperties[0m. To [93mutilize[0m this [93madvantage[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mprepared[0m a [93mpiezoelectric[0m [93mnanofibrous[0m [93mmembrane[0m [93mvia[0m [93melectrospinning[0m. This [93mmembrane[0m [95mintegrates[0m [93mpolyvinylidene[0m [93mfluoride[0m ([93mPVDF[0m) for [93mpiezoelectricity[0m, [93mZnO[0m-[93mNPs[0m for [93mantimicrobial[0m [93mactivity[0m, and [93mchitosan[0m ([93mCS[0m) for [93mhemostatic[0m and [93msupplementary[0m [93mantibacterial[0m [93mfunctions[0m. [93mBioelectric[0m [93mstimulation[0m was [93machieved[0m through [93mdual[0m [93mmechanisms[0m: [93mexogenous[0m [93mlow[0m-[93mintensity[0m [93mpulsed[0m [93multrasound[0m ([93mLIPUS[0m) and [93mendogenous[0m [93mmechanical[0m [93mmotion[0m from the [93mrat[0m [92mmodel[0m. The [93mresulting[0m [93mZnO[0m@[93mPVDF[0m/[93mCS[0m [93mmembrane[0m [93mexhibited[0m [93mexcellent[0m [93mmaterial[0m [93mproperties[0m, [93mstrong[0m [93mantimicrobial[0m [93mefficacy[0m, and [93maccelerated[0m in [93mvivo[0m [93mwound[0m [93mhealing[0m in [93mrat[0m [92mmodels[0m.
- [93mMechanism[0m of the [93melectrochemical[0m [93mhydrogenation[0m of [93mgraphene[0m.: The [93melectrochemical[0m [93mhydrogenation[0m of [93mgraphene[0m [93minduces[0m a [93mrobust[0m and [93mreversible[0m [93mconductor[0m-[93minsulator[0m [93mtransition[0m, of [93mstrong[0m [93minterest[0m in [93mlogic[0m-and-[93mmemory[0m [93mapplications[0m. [93mHowever[0m, its [93mmechanism[0m [93mremains[0m [93munknown[0m. [93mHere[0m [93mwe[0m [93mshow[0m that it [93mproceeds[0m as a [93mreduction[0m [93mreaction[0m in which [93mproton[0m [93madsorption[0m [93mcompetes[0m with the [93mformation[0m of [93mH[0m [93m2[0m [93mmolecules[0m [93mvia[0m an [93mEley[0m-[93mRideal[0m [93mprocess[0m. [93mGraphene[0m'[93ms[0m [93melectrochemical[0m [93mhydrogenation[0m is up to [93m10[0m [93m6[0m [93mtimes[0m [93mfaster[0m than [93malternative[0m [93mhydrogenation[0m [93mmethods[0m and is [93mfully[0m [93mreversible[0m [93mvia[0m the [93moxidative[0m [93mdesorption[0m of [93mprotons[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mdemonstrate[0m that the [93mproton[0m [93mreduction[0m [93mrate[0m in [93mdefect[0m-[93mfree[0m [93mgraphene[0m [93mcan[0m be [93menhanced[0m by an [93morder[0m of [93mmagnitude[0m by the [93mintroduction[0m of [93mnanoscale[0m [93mcorrugations[0m in its [93mlattice[0m, and that the [93msubstitution[0m of [93mprotons[0m for [93mdeuterons[0m [93mresults[0m [93mboth[0m in [93mlower[0m [93mpotentials[0m for the [93mhydrogenation[0m [93mprocess[0m and in a [93mmore[0m [93mstable[0m [93mcompound[0m. [93mOur[0m [93mresults[0m [93mpave[0m the [93mway[0m to [93minvestigating[0m the [93mchemisorption[0m of [93mions[0m in [93m2D[0m [93mmaterials[0m at [93mhigh[0m [93melectric[0m [93mfields[0m, [93mopening[0m a [93mnew[0m [93mavenue[0m to [93mcontrol[0m these [93mmaterials[0m' [93melectronic[0m [93mproperties[0m.
